subcategories.name: Chess
subcategories.description: Chess is a two-player strategy board game played on an 8x8 grid.

subcategories.name: Monopoly
subcategories.description: Monopoly is a classic board game where players buy, sell, and trade properties to build their empires.

subcategories.name: Poker
subcategories.description: Poker is a popular card game involving betting and strategic play.

subcategories.name: Uno
subcategories.description: Uno is a fun and fast-paced card game where players match colors and numbers to be the first to play all their cards.

games.name: Table Tennis
games.description: Table Tennis, also known as ping pong, is a fast and exciting indoor sport played on a small table with a ball and paddles.
